body:
This is still (now? still?) busted, and is a P(-1), because it's STILL blocking me from #11941. Please, please, can we get the docs working on the release branch?

```
+++ [0730 13:03:26] Building apiserver
+++ [0730 13:03:26] Building go targets for linux/amd64:
    cmd/kube-apiserver
+++ [0730 13:03:34] Placing binaries
etcd -data-dir /tmp/test-etcd.TQhhZC --bind-addr 127.0.0.1:4001 >/dev/null 2>/dev/null
Waiting for etcd to come up.
+++ [0730 13:03:36] On try 1, etcd: : 
{"action":"set","node":{"key":"/_test","value":"","modifiedIndex":3,"createdIndex":3}}
+++ [0730 13:03:37] Starting kube-apiserver
+++ [0730 13:03:37] On try 2, apiserver: : ok
+++ [0730 13:03:37] Updating 
    build/../hack/../api/swagger-spec
+++ [0730 13:03:37] SUCCESS
+++ [0730 13:03:38] Clean up complete
Checking that it builds... OK

Checking for files that need gofmt... OK

Checking for files that need boilerplate... OK

Checking for API descriptions... OK

Checking for docs that need updating... FAIL: changes needed but not made due to --verify
ERROR!
Some docs are out of sync between CLI and markdown.
To regenerate docs, run:
  hack/run-gendocs.sh

Checking for conversions that need updating... OK

Checking for deep-copies that need updating... OK

Checking for swagger spec that need updating... OK

Aborting commit
```

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

title: mark_new_version.sh STILL can't get past precommits on release-1.0 branch
